To make this dish, preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Grease a 9-inch round or square baking pan. Place the pizza dough in the pan and press it to the edges. Spread the sauce over the dough. Sprinkle with cheese, then top with desired toppings. Bake for 20 minutes or until the crust is golden brown.
To make this dish, preheat oven to 375 degrees. Place pizza dough in a greased pan. Top with desired toppings. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool before serving.
